casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Joe EDWARDS 53P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2017 Allegra Collins, Attorney at Law, Billy Joe Edwards, for Edwards, Billy Joe. Scott T. Stroud, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of February 2017 by Defendant for Writ of Supervisory Control:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of March 2017."
